author: Special Correspondent
text:
A-24-year-old youth from Hyderabad drowned in the Bay of Bengal on Monday while he was taking a bath on the beach near Auroville.

Rescued by fishermen

According to police, R.Sriram(24) had come on a holiday with his friends. A few fishermen rescued him and rushed him to hospital but the youth did not survive. The Auroville police registered a case in this regard.
title: Youth from Hyderabad drowns in sea
